Game.title: Game
Game.description: Represents a game instance in 'El Pueblo Duerme'.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Game entity.

creator.description: Reference to User who created the game. (Relationship: User 1:N Game)

players.description: Array of userIds playing the game.

maxPlayers.description: Maximum number of players allowed in the game.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the game was created.

currentRound.description: Current round number of the game.

settings.description: Game settings (number of werewolves, roles enabled, etc.).

Player.title: Player
Player.description: Represents a player in a specific game.

userId.description: Reference to User that represents the player. (Relationship: User 1:N Player)

gameId.description: Reference to Game in which the player is participating. (Relationship: Game 1:N Player)

role.description: The player's role in the game ('werewolf', 'villager', 'seer', 'doctor', 'hunter').

isAlive.description: Indicates whether the player is currently alive in the game.

votedFor.description: Reference to User this player voted for. (Relationship: User 1:N Player)

displayName.description: The display name of the player.

joinedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the player joined the game.

GameEvent.title: GameEvent
GameEvent.description: Represents a log entry for a specific game.

gameId.description: Reference to Game the log entry belongs to. (Relationship: Game 1:N GameLog)

message.description: Descriptive message for the log entry.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the log entry was created.

data.description: Additional data associated with the log entry (e.g., target of a kill, voter and target of a vote).

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.  Note: Authentication details are managed externally.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

avatar.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

definition.description: Stores game instances. The creator field indicates the user who created the game.
Stores player data for each game. Includes denormalized 'gameId' for authorization independence.

params.name: userId
params.description: Unique identifier for the user (player) in the game.

definition.description: Stores game logs. Write access is restricted. Read access is granted to any authenticated user.

params.name: eventId
params.description: Unique identifier for the game event.
